TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebBrowser extends System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserBase

summary.span: 使用户能够在你的窗体中导航网页。

span.span: Enables the user to navigate Web pages inside your form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用 控件，你可以在 Windows 窗体应用程序中承载网页和其他已启用浏览器的文档。The control lets you host Web pages and other browser-enabled documents in your Windows Forms applications. 例如，可以使用 控件在应用程序中提供基于 HTML 的集成用户协助或 Web 浏览功能。You can use the control, for example, to provide integrated HTML-based user assistance or Web browsing capabilities in your application. 此外，还可以使用 控件将现有的基于 Web 的控件添加到 Windows 窗体客户端应用程序。Additionally, you can use the control to add your existing Web-based controls to your Windows Forms client applications. > [!IMPORTANT] > 控件消耗大量资源。The control is resource-intensive. 请确保在使用完控件后调用 方法，以确保所有资源及时发布。Be sure to call the method when you are finished using the control to ensure that all resources are released in a timely fashion. 必须在附加事件的线程上调用 方法，该线程应始终为消息或用户界面（UI）线程。You must call the method on the same thread that attached the events, which should always be the message or user-interface (UI) thread. 部分受信任的代码不能使用 控件。The control cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[从部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). 控件具有几个与导航相关的属性、方法和事件。The control has several properties, methods, and events related to navigation. 使用以下成员可以将控件导航到特定 URL，在导航历史记录列表中向后移动，并加载当前用户的主页和搜索页面：The following members let you navigate the control to a specific URL, move backward and forward through the navigation history list, and load the home page and search page of the current user: - - - - - - 如果导航未成功，则会显示一个指示问题的页面。If the navigation is unsuccessful, a page indicating the problem is displayed. 导航到这些成员中的任何一种都会导致在导航的不同阶段发生 、和 事件。Navigation with any of these members causes the , , and events to occur at different stages of navigation. 这些成员和其他成员（例如 和 方法）使你可以在应用程序中实现与 Internet Explorer 中类似的用户界面控件。These and other members, such as the and methods, let you implement user interface controls in your application similar to those in Internet Explorer. 即使您不希望在窗体上显示 控件，某些成员也很有用。Some members are useful even when you do not want to display the control on your form. 例如，您可以使用 方法来打印最新版本的网页，而不向用户显示该页。For example, you can use the method to print the latest version of a Web page without displaying the page to the user. 使用 控件还可以显示在应用程序中创建的内容，也可以从数据库或资源文件中检索内容。The control also lets you display content that you create in your application or you retrieve from a database or resource file. 使用 或 属性可获取或设置当前文档的内容作为字符串或数据流。Use the or property to get or set the contents of the current document as a string or data stream. 还可以通过 属性来操作网页的内容，该属性包含一个 对象，该对象提供对当前页的 HTML 文档对象模型（DOM）的托管访问。You can also manipulate the contents of a Web page through the property, which contains an object that provides managed access to the HTML document object model (DOM) for the current page. 当与 属性结合使用时，此属性可用于在应用程序代码和网页中的动态 HTML （DHTML）代码之间实现双向通信，从而使你能够将基于 Web 的控件和 Windows 窗体控件合并到一个用户界面中。This property is useful, when used in combination with the property, to implement two-way communication between your application code and dynamic HTML (DHTML) code in a Web page, letting you combine Web-based controls and Windows Forms controls in a single user interface. 您可以使用 属性从您的应用程序调用脚本代码方法。You can use the property to call scripting code methods from your application. 脚本代码可通过 `window.external` 对象访问应用程序，该对象是为主机访问提供的内置 DOM 对象，并映射到您为 属性指定的对象。Your scripting code can access your application through the `window.external` object, which is a built-in DOM object provided for host access, and which maps to the object that you specify for the property. 控件是 ActiveX [WebBrowser 控件](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198812)的托管包装，并使用用户计算机上安装的任何版本的控件。The control is a managed wrapper for the ActiveX [WebBrowser control](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198812), and uses whichever version of the control is installed on the user's computer. > [!NOTE] > 此类在类级别提出安全要求。This class makes security demands at the class level. 当派生类或调用堆栈中的任何调用方不具有完全信任权限时，将引发 。A is thrown when a derived class or any caller in the call stack does not have full trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[继承要求](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100))。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)). > [!NOTE] > 类只能在设置为单线程单元（STA）模式的线程中使用。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用此类，请确保 `Main` 方法使用 属性进行标记。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现用于 控件的地址栏。The following code example demonstrates how to implement an address bar for use with the control. 此示例要求您具有一个窗体，该窗体包含一个名为 `webBrowser1`的 控件、一个名为 `TextBoxAddress`的 控件以及一个名为 的 `ButtonGo`控件。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control called `webBrowser1`, a control called `TextBoxAddress`, and a control called `ButtonGo`. 在文本框中键入 URL 并按 ENTER 或单击 "**开始**" 按钮时， 控件将导航到指定的 url。When you type a URL into the text box and press ENTER or click the **Go** button, the control navigates to the URL specified. 通过单击超链接进行导航时，文本框将自动更新以显示当前 URL。When you navigate by clicking a hyperlink, the text box automatically updates to display the current URL. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/VB/form1.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 控件会自动导航到拖放到它上面的文档。By default, the control automatically navigates to documents that are dropped onto it. 使用控件作为一般浏览器时，此行为很有用。This behavior is useful when you use the control as a generic browser. 如果你使用控件来显示专门为你的应用程序设计的内容（例如基于 HTML 的用户帮助），请将 属性设置为 `false` 以防止显示其他内容。If you use the control to display content designed specifically for your application, such as HTML-based user assistance, set the property to `false` to prevent the display of other content. 当你希望隐藏使用 控件的事实时，这特别有用，例如，创建一个用户界面，该用户界面可以将基于 Web 的控件与 Windows 窗体控件无缝组合。This is particularly useful when you want to conceal the fact that you are using the control, for example to create a user interface that seamlessly combines Web-based controls with Windows Forms controls. 您可以通过将 和 属性设置为 `false`来禁用其他标准浏览器功能。You can disable other standard browser features by setting the and properties to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 此属性与 属性无关，不会导致控件出现拖放事件，如 事件。This property is not related to the property and does not cause drag-and-drop events such as the event to occur for the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示导航历史记录中的上一页是否可用，如果可用， 方法才能成功。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether a previous page in navigation history is available, which allows the method to succeed.

value.span: 如果控件可以向后导航，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control can navigate backward; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件维护在浏览会话期间访问的所有网页的历史记录列表。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 方法将 控件导航到此历史记录中的上一页（如果有）。The method navigates the control to the previous page in this history, if one is available. 使用 属性来确定导航历史记录是否可用以及是否包含上一页。Use the property to determine whether navigation history is available and contains a previous page. 如果 `true`此属性， 方法将成功。If this property is `true`, the method will succeed. 否则，调用 方法将返回值 `false`，且不会发生导航。Otherwise, calling the method will return a value of `false` and no navigation will occur. 你还可以处理 事件，以便在 属性发生更改时接收通知。You can also handle the event to receive a notification when the property changes. 此事件的处理非常有用，例如，当 控件导航到或离开导航历史记录的开头时，更改 "**后退**" 按钮的 "已启用" 状态。Handling this event is useful, for example, to change the enabled state of a **Back** button when the control navigates to or leaves the beginning of the navigation history. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来实现 控件的 "**后退**" 按钮，该按钮类似于 Internet Explorer 中的 "**后退**" 按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to implement a **Back** button for the control that is similar to the **Back** button in Internet Explorer. 此示例要求窗体包含一个名为 `webBrowser1` 的 控件和一个名为 `backButton` 控件。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `backButton`. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件维护在浏览会话期间访问的所有网页的历史记录列表。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 方法将 控件导航到此历史记录中的上一页（如果有）。The method navigates the control to the previous page in this history, if one is available. 属性指示导航历史记录是否可用以及是否包含上一页。The property indicates whether navigation history is available and contains a previous page. 处理 事件，以便在 属性发生更改时接收通知。Handle the event to receive a notification when the property changes. 此事件的处理非常有用，例如，当 控件导航到或离开导航历史记录的开头时，更改 "**后退**" 按钮的 "已启用" 状态。Handling this event is useful, for example, to change the enabled state of a **Back** button when the control navigates to or leaves the beginning of the navigation history. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 事件的处理程序来实现 控件的 "**后退**" 按钮，该按钮类似于 Internet Explorer 中的 "**后退**" 按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the event to implement a **Back** button for the control that is similar to the **Back** button in Internet Explorer. 此示例要求窗体包含一个名为 `webBrowser1` 的 控件和一个名为 `backButton` 控件。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `backButton`. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件维护在浏览会话期间访问的所有网页的历史记录列表。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 方法会将 控件导航到此历史记录中的下一页（如果有）作为以前的反向导航的结果使用。The method navigates the control to the next page in this history, if one is available as a result of a previous backward navigation. 如果 `true`此属性， 方法将成功。If this property is `true`, the method will succeed. 否则，调用 方法将返回值 `false`，且不会发生导航。Otherwise, calling the method will return a value of `false` and no navigation will occur. 使用 属性来确定导航历史记录是否可用，以及是否有一个位于当前页面之后的页面，使 方法成功。Use the property to determine whether navigation history is available and contains a page located after the current one, allowing the method to succeed. 你还可以处理 事件，以便在 属性发生更改时接收通知。You can also handle the event to receive a notification when the property changes. 此事件的处理非常有用，例如，当 控件导航到或离开导航历史记录的末尾时，更改 "**前进**" 按钮的启用状态。Handling this event is useful, for example, to change the enabled state of a **Forward** button when the control navigates to or leaves the end of the navigation history. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 事件的处理程序来实现 控件的 "**前进**" 按钮，该按钮类似于 Internet Explorer 中的 "**转发**" 按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the event to implement a **Forward** button for the control that is similar to the **Forward** button in Internet Explorer. 此示例要求窗体包含一个名为 `webBrowser1` 的 控件和一个名为 `ButtonForward` 控件。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `ButtonForward`. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件维护在浏览会话期间访问的所有网页的历史记录列表。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 方法会将 控件导航到此历史记录中的下一页（如果有）作为以前的反向导航的结果使用。The method navigates the control to the next page in this history, if one is available as a result of a previous backward navigation. 属性指示导航历史记录是否可用，以及是否有一个位于当前页面之后的页面，以允许 方法成功。The property indicates whether navigation history is available and contains a page located after the current one, allowing the method to succeed. 处理 事件，以便在 属性发生更改时接收通知。Handle the event to receive a notification when the property changes. 此事件的处理非常有用，例如，当 控件导航到或离开导航历史记录的末尾时，更改 "**前进**" 按钮的启用状态。Handling this event is useful, for example, to change the enabled state of a **Forward** button when the control navigates to or leaves the end of the navigation history. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法实现与 Internet Explorer 中的 "**前进**" 按钮类似的 控件的**向前**按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement a **Forward** button for the control that is similar to the **Forward** button in Internet Explorer. 此示例要求窗体包含一个名为 `webBrowser1` 的 控件和一个名为 `ButtonForward` 控件。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `ButtonForward`. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/CPP/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/CS/form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/VB/form1.vb#8)]

summary.span: 使基础 ActiveX 控件与可以处理控件事件的客户端相关联。

span.span: Associates the underlying ActiveX control with a client that can handle control events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果对使用非托管 `WebBrowser` ActiveX 控件的 OLE 开发非常熟悉，并且想要扩展 Windows 窗体 控件（ActiveX 控件的托管包装）的功能，则此方法非常有用。This method is useful if you are familiar with OLE development using the unmanaged `WebBrowser` ActiveX control and you want to extend the functionality of the Windows Forms control, which is a managed wrapper for the ActiveX control. 可以使用此扩展性来实现 ActiveX 控件中的包装器控件未提供的事件。You can use this extensibility to implement events from the ActiveX control that are not provided by the wrapper control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在派生自 的类中使用此方法，该方法使用 OLE `DWebBrowserEvents2` 接口中的 `NavigateError` 事件对正常 事件进行补充。The following code example illustrates the use of this method in a class derived from that supplements the normal events with the `NavigateError` event from the OLE `DWebBrowserEvents2` interface. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果对使用非托管 `WebBrowser` ActiveX 控件的 OLE 开发非常熟悉，并且想要扩展 Windows 窗体 控件（ActiveX 控件的托管包装）的功能，则此方法非常有用。This method is useful if you are familiar with OLE development using the unmanaged `WebBrowser` ActiveX control and you want to extend the functionality of the Windows Forms control, which is a managed wrapper for the ActiveX control. 例如，你可以使用此扩展性来自定义浏览器快捷菜单和快捷键，或为托管文档提供自定义安全配置。You can use this extensibility, for example, to customize the browser shortcut menu and shortcut keys or to provide a custom security configuration for hosted documents. 若要使用此功能，请实现从 和 类继承的类。To use this feature, implement classes that inherit from the and classes. 非托管 `WebBrowser` ActiveX 控件使用受保护的 方法检索由 类实现的扩展性接口。The unmanaged `WebBrowser` ActiveX control uses the protected method to retrieve extensibility interfaces implemented by the class. 重写 方法，以返回你自己的类中继承自 类的实例。Override the method to return an instance of your own class that inherits from the class. 类提供 OLE `IDocHostUIHandler` 接口的默认实现。The class provides default implementations of the OLE `IDocHostUIHandler` interface. 你可以提供自己的此接口的实现或实现任何其他 `WebBrowser` ActiveX 控件接口，以便自定义控件的行为。You can provide your own implementation of this interface or implement any other `WebBrowser` ActiveX control interface in order to customize the behavior of the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果为任何 `IDocHostUIHandler` 成员提供自己的实现，则必须实现该接口的所有成员。If you provide your own implementation for any `IDocHostUIHandler` members, you must implement all the members of that interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果希望通过 HTML 文档对象模型（DOM）访问 控件中显示的网页的内容，请使用此属性。Use this property when you want to access the contents of a Web page displayed in the control through the HTML document object model (DOM). 例如，当你想要在 Windows 窗体应用程序中使用基于 Web 的控件时，这很有用。This is useful, for example, when you want to use Web-based controls in your Windows Forms application. 可以将此属性与 属性结合使用来实现 控件中显示的网页与应用程序之间的双向通信。You can use this property, in combination with the property, to implement two-way communication between a Web page displayed in the control and your application. 使用 方法从客户端应用程序代码调用网页中实现的脚本方法。Use the method to call script methods implemented in a Web page from your client application code. 脚本代码可通过 `window.external` 对象访问应用程序，该对象是为主机访问提供的内置 DOM 对象，并映射到您为 属性指定的对象。Your scripting code can access your application through the `window.external` object, which is a built-in DOM object provided for host access, and which maps to an object that you specify for the property. 若要以字符串形式访问网页的内容，请使用 属性。To access the contents of a Web page as a string, use the property. 若要作为 访问网页的内容，请使用 属性。To access the contents of a Web page as a , use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 事件处理程序中的 属性来确定是否已填充网页窗体。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in a handler for the event to determine whether a Web page form has been filled in. 如果输入字段不包含值，则会取消导航。If the input field does not contain a value, the navigation is canceled. 此示例要求窗体包含一个名为 `webBrowser1` 控件。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1`. summary.span: 在 控件完成加载文档时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control finishes loading a document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置了以下属性之一或调用方法， 控件将导航到新文档：The control navigates to a new document whenever one of the following properties is set or methods is called: - - - - - - - - 处理 事件，以在新文档加载完成时接收通知。Handle the event to receive notification when the new document finishes loading. 发生 事件时，将完全加载新文档，这意味着可以通过 、或 属性访问其内容。When the event occurs, the new document is fully loaded, which means you can access its contents through the , , or property. 若要在导航开始之前接收通知，请处理 事件。To receive notification before navigation begins, handle the event. 如果未满足某些条件（例如，当用户未完全填写表单时），则处理此事件可取消导航。Handling this event lets you cancel navigation if certain conditions have not been met, for example, when the user has not completely filled out a form. 处理 事件，以在 控件完成导航并开始在新位置加载文档时接收通知。Handle the event to receive notification when the control finishes navigation and has begun loading the document at the new location. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此事件在文档完全加载后打印文档。The following code example demonstrates the use of this event to print a document after it has fully loaded. [!code-csharp[WebBrowserMisc#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/WebBrowserMisc/CS/WebBrowserMisc.cs#10)] [!code-vb[WebBrowserMisc#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/WebBrowserMisc/vb/WebBrowserMisc.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性将网页从 对象加载到 控件。Use this property to load a Web page into the control from a object. 例如，您可以使用此属性从数据库或资源文件中加载网页。You can use this property, for example, to load Web pages from a database or resource file. 设置此属性时，在加载指定的文本之前， 控件会自动导航到 about：空白 URL。When you set this property, the control automatically navigates to the about:blank URL before loading the specified text. 这意味着，在设置此属性时，将发生 、和 事件，并且 属性的值不再有意义。This means that the , , and events occur when you set this property, and the value of the property is no longer meaningful. > [!NOTE] > 此属性包含当前文档的内容，即使已请求其他文档也是如此。This property contains the contents of the current document, even if another document has been requested. 如果设置此属性的值，然后立即再次检索它，则检索到的值可能不同于在 控件没有时间来加载新内容时设置的值。If you set the value of this property and then immediately retrieve it again, the value retrieved may be different than the value set if the control has not had time to load the new content. 可以在 事件处理程序中检索新的值。You can retrieve the new value in a event handler. 若要以字符串形式访问网页的内容，请使用 属性。To access the contents of a Web page as a string, use the property. 还可以通过 属性使用 HTML 文档对象模型（DOM）访问页面内容。You can also access the page contents using the HTML document object model (DOM) through the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要使用字符串处理工具来处理 控件中显示的 HTML 页面的内容，请使用此属性。Use this property when you want to manipulate the contents of an HTML page displayed in the control using string processing tools. 例如，您可以使用此属性从数据库加载页面，或使用正则表达式分析页面。You can use this property, for example, to load pages from a database or to analyze pages using regular expressions. 设置此属性时，在加载指定的文本之前， 控件会自动导航到 about：空白 URL。When you set this property, the control automatically navigates to the about:blank URL before loading the specified text. 这意味着，在设置此属性时，将发生 、和 事件，并且 属性的值不再有意义。This means that the , , and events occur when you set this property, and the value of the property is no longer meaningful. > [!NOTE] > 此属性包含当前文档的文本，即使已请求其他文档也是如此。This property contains the text of the current document, even if another document has been requested. 如果设置此属性的值，然后立即再次检索它，则检索到的值可能不同于在 控件没有时间来加载新内容时设置的值。If you set the value of this property and then immediately retrieve it again, the value retrieved may be different than the value set if the control has not had time to load the new content. 可以在 事件处理程序中检索新的值。You can retrieve the new value in a event handler. 或者，你可以通过在循环中调用 方法来阻止线程，直到 属性返回最初设置为的值。Alternatively, you can block the thread until the document is loaded by calling the method in a loop until the property returns the value that you originally set it to. 若要作为 访问网页的内容，请使用 属性。To access the contents of a Web page as a , use the property. 还可以通过 属性使用 HTML 文档对象模型（DOM）访问页面内容。You can also access the page contents using the HTML document object model (DOM) through the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性以编程方式显示所选的文档内容。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically display document content of your choosing. 此示例要求窗体包含一个名为 `webBrowser1` 控件。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1`. [!code-csharp[WebBrowserMisc#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/WebBrowserMisc/CS/WebBrowserMisc.cs#30)] [!code-vb[WebBrowserMisc#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/WebBrowserMisc/vb/WebBrowserMisc.vb#30)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以处理此事件，用 属性的当前值更新应用程序的标题栏。You can handle this event to update the title bar of your application with the current value of the property. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 事件的处理程序来更新窗体标题栏的标题栏和当前文档的标题。The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the event to update the form title bar with the title of the current document. 此示例要求窗体包含一个名为 `webBrowser1` 控件。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1`. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). summary.span: 在 控件导航到或离开使用了加密的网站时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control navigates to or away from a Web site that uses encryption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将此事件与 属性一起使用，以便在应用程序的用户界面中实现与 Internet Explorer 中的锁定图标类似的指示器。You can use this event with the property to implement an indicator in the user interface of your application similar to the lock icon in Internet Explorer. 在此事件的处理程序中，检查 属性的值，以确定是应隐藏还是显示指示器。In a handler for this event, check the value of the property to determine whether you should hide or display the indicator. 若要在 Internet Explorer 中模拟锁定图标的行为，还可以提供一个工具提示，在鼠标指针悬停在指示器上时显示加密级别。To mimic the behavior of the lock icon in Internet Explorer, you can also provide a ToolTip that shows the encryption level when the mouse pointer hovers over the indicator. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `WebBrowser1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `WebBrowser1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool GoBack() cil managed

summary.span: 如果导航历史记录中的上一页可用，则将 控件导航到该页。

span.span: Navigates the control to the previous page in the navigation history, if one is available.

returns.span: 如果导航成功，则为 ；如果导航历史记录中的上一页不可用，则为 。

span.span: if the navigation succeeds; if a previous page in the navigation history is not available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件维护在浏览会话期间访问的所有网页的历史记录列表。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 你可以使用 方法来实现类似于 Internet Explorer 中的**后退**按钮，这将允许你的用户返回到导航历史记录中的上一页。You can use the method to implement a **Back** button similar to the one in Internet Explorer, which will allow your users to return to a previous page in the navigation history. 使用 属性来确定导航历史记录是否可用以及是否包含上一页。Use the property to determine whether the navigation history is available and contains a previous page. 处理 事件，以便在 属性值更改时接收通知。Handle the event to receive a notification when the property value changes. 此事件的处理非常有用，例如，当 控件导航到或离开导航历史记录的开头时，更改 "**后退**" 按钮的 "已启用" 状态。Handling this event is useful, for example, to change the enabled state of a **Back** button when the control navigates to or leaves the beginning of the navigation history. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法来实现与 Internet Explorer 中类似的 控件的 "**后退**" 按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement a **Back** button for the control similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 此示例要求窗体包含一个名为 `webBrowser1` 的 控件和一个名为 `backButton` 控件。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `backButton`. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/CPP/form1.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/CS/form1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/VB/form1.vb#7)]

summary.span: 如果导航历史记录中的下一页可用，则将 控件导航到该页。

span.span: Navigates the control to the next page in the navigation history, if one is available.

returns.span: 如果导航成功，则为 ；如果导航历史记录中的下一页不可用，则为 。

span.span: if the navigation succeeds; if a subsequent page in the navigation history is not available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件维护在浏览会话期间访问的所有网页的历史记录列表。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 您可以使用 方法来实现与 Internet Explorer 中类似的 "**前进**" 按钮，从而允许用户在向后导航后返回到导航历史记录中的下一页。You can use the method to implement a **Forward** button similar to the one in Internet Explorer, allowing your users to return to the next page in the navigation history after navigating backward. 使用 属性来确定导航历史记录是否可用，以及是否包含一个位于当前页面之后的页面。Use the property to determine whether the navigation history is available and contains a page located after the current one. 处理 事件，以便在 属性值更改时接收通知。Handle the event to receive a notification when the property value changes. 此事件的处理非常有用，例如，当 控件导航到或离开导航历史记录的末尾时，更改 "**前进**" 按钮的启用状态。Handling this event is useful, for example, to change the enabled state of a **Forward** button when the control navigates to or leaves the end of the navigation history. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法来实现与 Internet Explorer 中类似的 控件的**向前**按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement a **Forward** button for the control similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 此示例要求窗体包含一个名为 `webBrowser1` 的 控件和一个名为 `ButtonForward` 控件。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `ButtonForward`. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法来实现与 Internet Explorer 中类似的 "**主页**" 按钮。You can use this method to implement a **Home** button similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 用户可以在 " **Internet 选项**" 对话框中指定主页，该对话框可从 "控制面板" 或 Internet Explorer 的 "**工具**" 菜单中获取。The user can specify a home page in the **Internet Options** dialog box, which is available from Control Panel or from the **Tools** menu in Internet Explorer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法来实现与 Internet Explorer 中类似的 控件的 "**主页**" 按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement a **Home** button for the control similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 此示例要求窗体包含一个名为 `webBrowser1` 的 控件和一个名为 `ButtonHome` 控件。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `ButtonHome`. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void GoSearch() cil managed

summary.span: 将 控件导航到当前用户的默认搜索页。

span.span: Navigates the control to the default search page of the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于实现与 Internet Explorer 中类似的搜索功能。You can use this method to implement a search feature similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 根据安装的 Internet Explorer 版本，用户可以在 " **Internet 选项**" 对话框中指定默认搜索页面，该对话框可从 "控制面板" 中或在 Internet Explorer 的 "**工具**" 菜单中找到。Depending on the version of Internet Explorer installed, the user can specify a default search page in the **Internet Options** dialog box, which is available from Control Panel or from the **Tools** menu in Internet Explorer. 默认搜索页面存储在注册表中 `HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Internet Explorer\Main\Search Page` 注册表项下。The default search page is stored in the registry under the `HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Internet Explorer\Main\Search Page` registry key. 对于更高版本的 Internet Explorer，必须修改此注册表项才能更改此方法使用的默认搜索页。With later versions of Internet Explorer, this registry key must be modified in order to change the default search page used by this method. 若要使用除默认值以外的搜索页，请调用 方法或指定 属性。To use a search page other than the default, call the method or specify the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法来实现与 Internet Explorer 中类似的 控件的**搜索**按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement a **Search** button for the control similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 此示例要求窗体包含一个名为 `webBrowser1` 的 控件和一个名为 `ButtonSearch` 控件。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `ButtonSearch`. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，当用户右键单击 控件时，该控件将显示快捷菜单。By default, the control displays a shortcut menu when a user right-clicks it. 使用控件作为一般浏览器时，此行为很有用。This behavior is useful when you use the control as a generic browser. 如果要隐藏使用 控件这一事实，例如，若要创建将基于 Web 的控件与 Windows 窗体控件无缝组合的用户界面，请将 属性设置为 false。If you want to conceal the fact that you are using the control, for example to create a user interface that seamlessly combines Web-based controls with Windows Forms controls, set the property to false. 您可以通过将 和 属性设置为 false 来禁用其他标准的浏览器功能。You can disable other standard browser features by setting the and properties to false. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ObjectForScripting#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ObjectForScripting/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ObjectForScripting#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ObjectForScripting/vb/form1.vb#2)]

span.span: Loads the document at the specified Uniform Resource Locator (URL) into the control, replacing the previous document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件维护在浏览会话期间访问的所有网页的历史记录列表。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 当你调用此重载时， 控件将导航到指定的 URI，并将其添加到历史记录列表的末尾。When you call this overload, the control navigates to the specified URI and adds it to the end of the history list. 使用 方法将控件返回到导航历史记录中的上一页。Use the method to return the control to a previous page in the navigation history. 向后导航后，使用 方法返回导航历史记录中的后续页面。Use the method to return to a later page in the navigation history after navigating backward. 控件将最近访问过的站点中的网页存储在本地硬盘上的缓存中。The control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk. 每个页面都可以指定一个过期日期，指示它将在缓存中保留多长时间。Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache. 当控件导航到某个页面时，它会通过显示缓存的版本来节省时间（如果有），而不是再次下载页面。When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again. 使用 方法可通过下载来强制 控件重新加载当前页，确保控件显示最新版本。Use the method to force the control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version. 可以使用 方法来实现类似于 Internet Explorer 中的地址栏。You can use the method to implement an address bar similar to the one in Internet Explorer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件维护在浏览会话期间访问的所有网页的历史记录列表。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 当你调用此重载时， 控件将导航到指定的 URI，并将其添加到历史记录列表的末尾。When you call this overload, the control navigates to the specified URI and adds it to the end of the history list. 使用 方法将控件返回到导航历史记录中的上一页。Use the method to return the control to a previous page in the navigation history. 向后导航后，使用 方法返回导航历史记录中的后续页面。Use the method to return to a later page in the navigation history after navigating backward. 控件将最近访问过的站点中的网页存储在本地硬盘上的缓存中。The control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk. 每个页面都可以指定一个过期日期，指示它将在缓存中保留多长时间。Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache. 当控件导航到某个页面时，它会通过显示缓存的版本来节省时间（如果有），而不是再次下载页面。When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again. 使用 方法可通过下载来强制 控件重新加载当前页，确保控件显示最新版本。Use the method to force the control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version. 可以使用 方法来实现类似于 Internet Explorer 中的地址栏。You can use the method to implement an address bar similar to the one in Internet Explorer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法实现 控件的地址栏。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement an address bar for the control. 此示例要求窗体包含一个名为 `webBrowser1`的 控件、一个名为 `TextBoxAddress` 控件和一个名为 的 `ButtonGo`控件。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1`, a control called `TextBoxAddress`, and a control called `ButtonGo`. 在文本框中键入 URL 并按 ENTER 或单击 "**开始**" 按钮时， 控件将导航到指定的 url。When you type a URL into the text box and press ENTER or click the **Go** button, the control navigates to the URL specified. 通过单击超链接进行导航时，文本框将自动更新以显示当前 URL。When you navigate by clicking a hyperlink, the text box automatically updates to display the current URL. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). summary.span: 将指定的统一资源定位器 (URL) 处的文档加载到浏览器新窗口或 控件中。

span.span: Loads the document at the specified Uniform Resource Locator (URL) into a new browser window or into the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件维护在浏览会话期间访问的所有网页的历史记录列表。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 使用 `false`的 `newWindow` 参数值调用此重载时，控件通常会导航到指定的 URI，并将 URI 添加到历史记录列表的末尾。When you call this overload with a `newWindow` parameter value of `false`, the control navigates to the specified URI normally and adds the URI to the end of the history list. 使用 `true`的 `newWindow` 参数值调用此重载时， 控件会将指定 URI 处的文档加载到新的 Internet Explorer 窗口，该窗口将维护其自己的导航历史记录。When you call this overload with a `newWindow` parameter value of `true`, the control loads the document at the specified URI into a new Internet Explorer window, which maintains its own navigation history. 您可以处理 事件以便在打开新的浏览器窗口之前接收通知，以便在必要时取消该操作。You can handle the event to receive notification before a new browser window is opened, allowing you to cancel the action if necessary. 控件将最近访问过的站点中的网页存储在本地硬盘上的缓存中。The control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk. 每个页面都可以指定一个过期日期，指示它将在缓存中保留多长时间。Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache. 当控件导航到页面或将页面加载到单独的浏览器窗口时，它会通过显示缓存的版本来节省时间（如果有），而不是再次下载页面。When the control navigates to a page or loads a page into a separate browser window, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again. 使用 方法可通过下载来强制 控件重新加载当前页，确保控件显示最新版本。Use the method to force the control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version. 当页面加载到单独的 Internet Explorer 窗口中时，用户可以通过单击 "**刷新**" 按钮来检索最新版本。When a page is loaded into a separate Internet Explorer window, the user can retrieve the latest version by clicking the **Refresh** button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件维护在浏览会话期间访问的所有网页的历史记录列表。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 当你调用此重载时， 控件将指定 URI 处的文档加载到具有指定名称的网页框架，并将 URI 添加到历史记录列表的末尾。When you call this overload, the control loads the document at the specified URI into the Web page frame with the specified name, and adds the URI to the end of the history list. 如果指定的帧名称无效，则会将文档加载到新的 Internet Explorer 窗口中。If the frame name specified is invalid, the document is loaded into a new Internet Explorer window. 使用 方法将控件返回到导航历史记录中的上一页。Use the method to return the control to a previous page in the navigation history. 向后导航后，使用 方法返回导航历史记录中的后续页面。Use the method to return to a later page in the navigation history after navigating backward. 控件将最近访问过的站点中的网页存储在本地硬盘上的缓存中。The control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk. 每个页面都可以指定一个过期日期，指示它将在缓存中保留多长时间。Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache. 当控件导航到某个页面时，它会通过显示缓存的版本来节省时间（如果有），而不是再次下载页面。When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again. 使用 方法可通过下载来强制 控件重新加载当前页，确保控件显示最新版本。Use the method to force the control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version.

span.span: Loads the document at the specified Uniform Resource Locator (URL) into the control, requesting it using the specified HTTP data and replacing the contents of the Web page frame with the specified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件维护在浏览会话期间访问的所有网页的历史记录列表。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 当你调用此重载时， 控件将指定 URI 处的文档加载到具有指定名称的网页框架，并将 URI 添加到历史记录列表的末尾。When you call this overload, the control loads the document at the specified URI into the Web page frame with the specified name, and adds the URI to the end of the history list. 如果指定的帧名称无效，则会将文档加载到新的 Internet Explorer 窗口中。If the frame name specified is invalid, the document is loaded into a new Internet Explorer window. 使用 方法将控件返回到导航历史记录中的上一页。Use the method to return the control to a previous page in the navigation history. 向后导航后，使用 方法返回导航历史记录中的后续页面。Use the method to return to a later page in the navigation history after navigating backward. 控件将最近访问过的站点中的网页存储在本地硬盘上的缓存中。The control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk. 每个页面都可以指定一个过期日期，指示它将在缓存中保留多长时间。Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache. 当控件导航到某个页面时，它会通过显示缓存的版本来节省时间（如果有），而不是再次下载页面。When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again. 使用 方法可通过下载来强制 控件重新加载当前页，确保控件显示最新版本。Use the method to force the control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version.

span.span: Loads the document at the location indicated by the specified into the control, requesting it using the specified HTTP data and replacing the contents of the Web page frame with the specified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件维护在浏览会话期间访问的所有网页的历史记录列表。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 当你调用此重载时， 控件将指定 URI 处的文档加载到具有指定名称的网页框架，并将 URI 添加到历史记录列表的末尾。When you call this overload, the control loads the document at the specified URI into the Web page frame with the specified name, and adds the URI to the end of the history list. 如果指定的帧名称无效，则会将文档加载到新的 Internet Explorer 窗口中。If the frame name specified is invalid, the document is loaded into a new Internet Explorer window. 使用 方法将控件返回到导航历史记录中的上一页。Use the method to return the control to a previous page in the navigation history. 向后导航后，使用 方法返回导航历史记录中的后续页面。Use the method to return to a later page in the navigation history after navigating backward. 控件将最近访问过的站点中的网页存储在本地硬盘上的缓存中。The control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk. 每个页面都可以指定一个过期日期，指示它将在缓存中保留多长时间。Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache. 当控件导航到某个页面时，它会通过显示缓存的版本来节省时间（如果有），而不是再次下载页面。When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again. 使用 方法可通过下载来强制 控件重新加载当前页，确保控件显示最新版本。Use the method to force the control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version.

summary.span: 在 控件导航到新文档并开始加载该文档时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control has navigated to a new document and has begun loading it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置了以下属性之一或调用方法， 控件将导航到新文档：The control navigates to a new document whenever one of the following properties is set or methods is called: - - - - - - - - 处理 事件，以便在 控件导航到新文档时接收通知。Handle the event to receive notification when the control has navigated to a new document. 当发生 事件时，新文档开始加载，这意味着你可以通过 、和 属性访问加载的内容。When the event occurs, the new document has begun loading, which means you can access the loaded content through the , , and properties. 处理 事件，以便在 控件完成加载新文档时接收通知。Handle the event to receive notification when the control finishes loading the new document. 你还可以在导航开始之前通过处理 事件接收通知。You can also receive notification before navigation begins by handling the event. 如果尚未满足某些条件，则处理此事件可取消导航，例如，用户未完全填写表单。Handling this event lets you cancel navigation if certain conditions have not been met, for example, the user has not completely filled out a form. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 事件的处理程序来实现 控件的地址栏。The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the event to implement an address bar for the control. 此示例要求窗体包含一个名为 `webBrowser1`的 控件、一个名为 `TextBoxAddress` 控件和一个名为 的 `ButtonGo`控件。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1`, a control called `TextBoxAddress`, and a control called `ButtonGo`. 在文本框中键入 URL 并按 ENTER 或单击 "**开始**" 按钮时， 控件将导航到指定的 url。When you type a URL into the text box and press ENTER or click the **Go** button, the control navigates to the URL specified. 通过单击超链接进行导航时，文本框将自动更新以显示当前 URL。When you navigate by clicking a hyperlink, the text box automatically updates to display the current URL. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). summary.span: 在 控件导航到新文档之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the control navigates to a new document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置了以下属性之一或调用方法， 控件将导航到新文档：The control navigates to a new document whenever one of the following properties is set or methods is called: - - - - - - - - 如果尚未满足某些条件（例如，当用户未完全填写表单时），则可处理 事件以取消导航。You can handle the event to cancel navigation if certain conditions have not been met, for example, when the user has not completely filled out a form. 若要取消导航，请将传递到事件处理程序的 对象的 属性设置为 "`true`"。To cancel navigation, set the property of the object passed to the event handler to `true`. 还可以使用此对象通过 属性检索新文档的 URL。You can also use this object to retrieve the URL of the new document through the property. 如果新文档将显示在网页框架中，则可以通过 "" 属性检索框架的名称。If the new document will be displayed in a Web page frame, you can retrieve the name of the frame through the property. 处理 事件，以在 控件完成导航并开始在新位置加载文档时接收通知。Handle the event to receive notification when the control finishes navigation and has begun loading the document at the new location. 处理 事件，以便在 控件完成加载新文档时接收通知。Handle the event to receive notification when the control finishes loading the new document. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 事件的处理程序在未填充网页窗体时取消导航。The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the event to cancel navigation when a Web page form has not been filled in. 属性用于确定窗体输入字段是否包含值。The property is used to determine whether the form input field contains a value. 此示例要求您的窗体包含一个名为 `webBrowser1` 控件，并且您的窗体类具有 使其可供 COM 使用。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and that your form class has a making it accessible to COM. 有关可以将以下代码粘贴到的完整代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For a complete code example that you can paste the following code into, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). summary.span: 在浏览器新窗口打开之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before a new browser window is opened.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当鼠标指针悬停在超链接上时， 控件将打开一个单独的浏览器窗口，当调用 方法的适当重载或当用户在浏览器快捷菜单中单击 "**打开时打开**" 选项时。The control opens a separate browser window when the appropriate overload of the method is called or when the user clicks the **Open in New Window** option of the browser shortcut menu when the mouse pointer hovers over a hyperlink. 可以通过将 属性设置为 false 来禁用快捷菜单。You can disable the shortcut menu by setting the property to false. 事件发生在新的浏览器窗口打开之前。The event occurs before the new browser window is opened. 例如，你可以处理此事件，以便在未满足某些条件时阻止窗口打开。You can handle this event, for example, to prevent the window from opening when certain conditions have not been met. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `WebBrowser1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `WebBrowser1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#651](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#651)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#651](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#651)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象可由显示在 控件中的网页所包含的脚本代码访问。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that can be accessed by scripting code that is contained within a Web page displayed in the control.

value.span: 可用于脚本代码的对象。

span.span: The object being made available to the scripting code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可以启用 控件承载的网页与包含 控件的应用程序之间的通信。Use this property to enable communication between a Web page hosted by the control and the application that contains the control. 此属性使你能够将动态 HTML （DHTML）代码与客户端应用程序代码集成。This property lets you integrate dynamic HTML (DHTML) code with your client application code. 为此属性指定的对象可用于作为 `window.external` 对象的网页脚本，该对象是为主机访问提供的内置 DOM 对象。The object specified for this property is available to Web page script as the `window.external` object, which is a built-in DOM object provided for host access. 您可以将此属性设置为您希望其公共属性和方法可用于脚本代码的任何 COM 可见的对象。You can set this property to any COM-visible object for which you want its public properties and methods available to scripting code. 可以通过将其标记为 来使类成为 COM 可见的。You can make a class COM-visible by marking it with the . 若要从客户端应用程序代码调用网页中定义的函数，请使用可以从 属性检索 对象的 方法。To call functions defined in your Web page from your client application code, use the method of the object you can retrieve from the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 在此示例中， 属性设置为当前窗体。In the example, the property is set to the current form. summary.span: 使用当前打印和页面设置打印当前显示在 控件中的文档。

span.span: Prints the document currently displayed in the control using the current print and page settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法来实现类似于 Internet Explorer 中的 "**打印**" 按钮。You can use this method to implement a **Print** button similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 此方法打印当前文档，而无需进一步的用户输入。This method prints the current document without requiring further user input. 若要在打印之前显示 "**打印**" 对话框，请使用 方法。To display the **Print** dialog box prior to printing, use the method. 若要显示 "**页面设置**" 对话框，该对话框允许用户指定页眉和页脚值以及其他页面设置，请使用 方法。To display the **Page Setup** dialog box, which lets your users specify header and footer values and other page settings, use the method. 若要显示 "**打印预览**" 对话框，请使用 方法。To display the **Print Preview** dialog box, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法来实现 控件的**打印**按钮，该按钮类似于 Internet Explorer 中的 "**打印**" 按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement a **Print** button for the control that is similar to the **Print** button in Internet Explorer. 此示例要求窗体包含一个名为 `webBrowser1` 的 控件和一个名为 `ButtonPrint` 控件。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `ButtonPrint`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此事件的处理程序来实现类似于 Internet Explorer 中的导航进度栏。You can use a handler for this event to implement a navigation progress bar similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 使用 属性来确定已成功下载的字节数。Use the property to determine the number of bytes that have been downloaded successfully. 使用 属性来确定可供下载的总字节数。Use the property to determine the total number of bytes available for downloading. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `WebBrowser1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `WebBrowser1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: 通过检查服务器获取更新版本，重新加载当前显示在 控件中的文档。

span.span: Reloads the document currently displayed in the control by checking the server for an updated version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将最近访问过的站点中的网页存储在本地硬盘上的缓存中。The control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk. 每个页面都可以指定一个过期日期，指示它将在缓存中保留多长时间。Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache. 当控件导航到某个页面时，它会通过显示缓存的版本来节省时间（如果有），而不是再次下载页面。When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again. 方法通过下载来强制 控件重新加载当前页，确保控件显示最新版本。The method forces the control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version. 您可以使用此方法来实现与 Internet Explorer 中类似的**刷新**按钮。You can use this method to implement a **Refresh** button similar to the one in Internet Explorer. > [!NOTE] > 文档刷新只是重新加载当前页，因此在调用 方法时不会出现 、和 事件。A document refresh simply reloads the current page, so the , , and events do not occur when you call the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法来实现与 Internet Explorer 中类似的 控件的**刷新**按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement a **Refresh** button for the control similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 此示例要求窗体包含一个名为 `webBrowser1` 的 控件和一个名为 `ButtonRefresh` 控件。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `ButtonRefresh`. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/CPP/form1.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/VB/form1.vb#10)]

summary.span: 使用指定的刷新选项重新加载当前显示在 控件中的文档。

span.span: Reloads the document currently displayed in the control using the specified refresh options.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将最近访问过的网页存储在本地硬盘上的缓存中。The control stores recently visited Web pages in a cache on the local hard disk. 每个页面都可以指定一个过期日期，指示它将在缓存中保留多长时间。Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache. 当控件导航到某个页面时，它会通过显示缓存的版本来节省时间（如果有），而不是再次下载页面。When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again. 方法强制 控件重新加载当前页。The method forces the control to reload the current page. 重载的类型取决于指定的 值。The type of reload depends on the value specified. 如果用 值调用 方法，则会下载该文档的最新版本。If you call the method with the value, the latest version of the document is downloaded. 如果使用 值，则仅当当前文档已过期时才下载最新版本。If you use the value, the latest version is downloaded only if the current document has expired. 如果使用 值，则服务器将发送其自己的缓存中存储的文档的副本。If you use the value, the server sends a copy of the document stored in its own cache. > [!NOTE] > 文档刷新只是重新加载当前页，因此在调用 方法时不会出现 、和 事件。A document refresh simply reloads the current page, so the , , and events do not occur when you call the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 是否显示对话框，如脚本错误消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the displays dialog boxes such as script error messages.

value.span: 如果控件不显示其对话框，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control does not display its dialog boxes; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为 `false` 可调试在 控件中显示的网页。Set this property to `false` to debug Web pages that you display in the control. 当您使用控件将基于 Web 的控件和脚本代码添加到您的应用程序中时，这非常有用。This is useful when you use the control to add Web-based controls and scripting code to your application. 使用控件作为一般浏览器时，此方法不太有用。It is less useful when you use the control as a generic browser. 调试完应用程序后，请将此属性设置为 "`true`" 以取消显示脚本错误。When you have finished debugging your application, set this property to `true` to suppress script errors. > [!NOTE] > 将 设置为 `true`时， 控件将隐藏源自基础 ActiveX 控件的所有对话框，而不只是脚本错误。When is set to `true`, the control hides all its dialog boxes that originate from the underlying ActiveX control, not just script errors. 有时，可能需要在显示对话框（例如用于浏览器安全设置和用户登录的对话框）时禁止显示脚本错误。Occasionally you might need to suppress script errors while displaying dialog boxes such as those used for browser security settings and user login. 在这种情况下，将 设置为 `false` 并取消 事件的处理程序中的脚本错误。In this case, set to `false` and suppress script errors in a handler for the event. 有关详细信息，请参阅本主题中的代码示例。For more information, see the code example in this topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在不取消其他对话框的情况下禁止显示脚本错误。The following code example demonstrates how to suppress script errors without suppressing other dialog boxes. 在此示例中， 属性设置为 `false` 以确保显示对话框。In the example, the property is set to `false` to ensure that dialog boxes are displayed. 事件的处理程序禁止显示错误。A handler for the event suppresses the error. 此事件仅在文档加载完成时才可访问，因此处理程序附加在 事件处理程序中。This event is only accessible when a document is finished loading, so the handler is attached in a event handler. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法来实现类似于 Internet Explorer 的 "**文件**" 菜单上的 "**另存为**" 菜单项。You can use this method to implement a **Save As** menu item similar to the one on the Internet Explorer **File** menu. 调用此方法时出现的对话框取决于当前加载的文档类型。The dialog box that appears when this method is called depends on the document type currently loaded. > [!NOTE] > 此方法允许用户仅保存原始加载的文档内容。This method allows users to save only the contents of the document as it was originally loaded. 在运行时通过 属性对文档所做的任何修改都不会保留。Any modifications made to the document at run time through the property are not persisted. 有关检索运行时修改的信息，请参阅[如何：访问托管 html 文档对象模型中的 HTML 源](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-access-the-html-source-in-the-managed-html-document-object-model.md)。For information on retrieving the run-time modifications, see [How to: Access the HTML Source in the Managed HTML Document Object Model](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-access-the-html-source-in-the-managed-html-document-object-model.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法来实现类似于 Internet Explorer 的 "**文件**" 菜单上的 "**另存为**" 菜单选项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement a **Save As** menu option that is similar to the one on the Internet Explorer **File** menu. 此示例要求您的窗体包含一个菜单项，菜单项名为 "`MenuItemFileSaveAs`"， 控件称为 "`webBrowser1`"。This example requires that your form contains a menu with a menu item called `MenuItemFileSaveAs` and a control called `webBrowser1`. MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ Url { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };
member this.Url : Uri with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当前文档的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the current document.

value.span: ，表示当前文档的名称。

span.span: A representing the URL of the current document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性等效于调用 方法并向其传递指定的 URL。Setting this property is equivalent to calling the method and passing it the specified URL. 控件维护在浏览会话期间访问的所有网页的历史记录列表。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 设置 属性时， 控件将导航到指定的 URL，并将其添加到历史记录列表的末尾。When you set the property, the control navigates to the specified URL and adds it to the end of the history list. 控件将最近访问过的站点中的网页存储在本地硬盘上的缓存中。The control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk. 每个页面都可以指定一个过期日期，指示它将在缓存中保留多长时间。Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache. 当控件导航到某个页面时，它会通过显示缓存的版本来节省时间（如果有），而不是再次下载页面。When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again. 使用 方法可通过下载来强制 控件重新加载当前页，确保控件显示最新版本。Use the method to force the control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version. > [!NOTE] > 此属性包含当前文档的 URL，即使已请求其他文档也是如此。This property contains the URL of the current document, even if another document has been requested. 如果设置此属性的值，然后立即再次检索它，则检索到的值可能不同于在 控件没有时间来加载新文档时设置的值。If you set the value of this property and then immediately retrieve it again, the value retrieved may be different than the value set if the control has not had time to load the new document. 可以在 事件处理程序中检索新的值。You can retrieve the new value in a event handler. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性为 控件实现地址栏。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to implement an address bar for the control. 此示例要求窗体包含一个名为 `webBrowser1`的 控件、一个名为 `TextBoxAddress` 控件和一个名为 的 `ButtonGo`控件。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1`, a control called `TextBoxAddress`, and a control called `ButtonGo`. 在文本框中键入 URL 并按 ENTER 或单击 "**开始**" 按钮时， 控件将导航到指定的 url。When you type a URL into the text box and press ENTER or click the **Go** button, the control navigates to the URL specified. 通过单击超链接进行导航时，文本框将自动更新以显示当前 URL。When you navigate by clicking a hyperlink, the text box automatically updates to display the current URL. span.span: A object representing the version of Internet Explorer installed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件是围绕与 Internet Explorer 一起安装的组件的托管包装。The control is a managed wrapper around a component installed with Internet Explorer. 使用此属性来确定安装了哪个版本的 Internet Explorer。Use this property to determine which version of Internet Explorer is installed. 当应用程序使用 Internet Explorer 的一项功能，而该功能仅在某些版本中提供时，这非常有用。This is useful when your application uses a feature of Internet Explorer that is present only in certain versions. 如果本地计算机上未提供所需的版本，你可以提供其他功能或提示用户进行升级。If the required version is not present on the local machine, you can provide alternative functionality or prompt the user to upgrade.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为 false 可防止用户使用 Internet Explorer 键盘快捷方式与 控件。Set this property to false to prevent your users from using Internet Explorer keyboard shortcuts with the control. 当你希望隐藏使用 控件的事实时，这非常有用，例如，创建一个用户界面，该用户界面可以将基于 DHTML 的控件与 Windows 窗体控件无缝组合。This is useful when you want to conceal the fact that you are using the control, for example to create a user interface that seamlessly combines DHTML-based controls with Windows Forms controls. 您可以通过将 和 属性设置为 `false`来禁用其他标准浏览器功能。You can disable other standard browser features by setting the and properties to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property.
